text.div:
LocationPostalCodeSearchParameter

Parameter address-postalcode:string

Searches based on the address-postalcode field for the location record eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/Location?address-postalcode={postalCode}

ResourceLocation
Expression(none)
Target ResourcesLocation
MultiplesThe parameter cannot repeat or have multiple values

name: LocationPostalCodeSearchParameter
description: Searches based on the address-postalcode field for the location record eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/Location?address-postalcode={postalCode}
